description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a host, with templating to select the datasource and hostname.

targets.query: SELECT (100-value) FROM cpu_value WHERE (host =~ /^$host$/ AND type_instance = 'idle') AND $timeFilter ORDER BY DESC LIMIT $cores
SELECT (100-value) FROM cpu_value WHERE (host =~ /^$host$/ AND type_instance = 'idle') AND $timeFilter ORDER BY DESC LIMIT $cores
SELECT sum("value") /$cores FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "type" = 'percent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") /$cores FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "type" = 'percent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") /$cores FROM "cpu_value" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "type" = 'percent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM interface_rx WITH KEY=instance
list.label: Network interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM interface_rx WITH KEY=instance

list.definition: SELECT value FROM cpu_value WHERE type = 'count' AND host = '$host' ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
list.name: cores
list.query: SELECT value FROM cpu_value WHERE type = 'count' AND host = '$host' ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1

title: Metrics (collectd)
